attributes.action: ban the display of the eu flag & symbols.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ban the display of the eu flag and symbols as they were removed from the eu constitution when it was re drawn as the lisbon treaty, (which britain has signed to) now they have been reintroduced thus becoming the constitutional emblem and therefore britain should now hold the promised referendum.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
